nodes.name: transfer

attributes.name: transfer

transfer(address,uint256).notice: #if_succeeds _to != msg.sender ==> _balances[_to] == old(_balances[_to]) + _value; #if_succeeds _to != msg.sender ==> _balances[msg.sender] == old(_balances[msg.sender]) - _value; #if_succeeds {:msg "sending to self doesn't mutate asnything"} _to == msg.sender ==> _balances[msg.sender] == old(_balances[_to]); #if_succeeds _balances[msg.sender] >= _value;
